page.title: 04LLANDERLO CONT
page.content: which are rented out. There is a small depot for skin collecting on A40. This used to be a tannery. Farming- Some farmers have a specialised computer for calculating feed levels for dairy herds. This area is part of a very important milk producing region. Some grow their own vegtables. One social worker and his wife with a small holding also produce vegetables to sell and keep geese, ducks hens goats and bees. Another couple with a small holding also produces yoghurt, cheese free range eggs for sale. One farmer regularly appears on T,V and Radio farming programmes. The wife of a farm worker is part time vet.
